import React, { Component } from 'react' class UserPostImgs extends Component { render() {const {posts} = this.props return (
{posts.map((postImg, i) => (
i.target.src=`${appPostDefaultImg}`} className='img-fluid' height='200px' width='100%' style={{borderRadius: '12%'}}/>
  • Likes: 56

))}
) } } export default UserPostImgs
